# Reproduction of GraalVM native-image issue with CRC32 computations on Arch Linux


## Generate binaries from Ubuntu

```text
$ docker run -it --rm -v "$(pwd):/workspace" -w /workspace ubuntu:20.04
# ./setup-ubuntu.sh && ./setup-tools.sh
# ./generate-native-image.sh
# ./compute-crc32 MANIFEST.MF
CRC32: 6318fb
# ./compute-crc32 MANIFEST.MF "$(cat splits)"
Using splits: 512,1024,1320,1832,2344,2856,3368,3880,4392,4904,5416,5766,6278,6790,7302,7814,8326,8838,9093,9605,10117,10629,11141,11653,12165,12677,13189,13559,14071,14583,15095,15607,16119,16631,17143,17655,18052,18564,19076,19588,20100,20612,21124,21636,21952,22464,22976,23488,24000,24512,25024,25536,26048,26560,27072,27584,27619,28131,28643,29155,29667,30179,30691,31203,31715,32227,32739,33251,33694,34206,34718,35230
CRC32: 6318fb
# exit
```

(Same CRC32 in both cases.)

## Run them from Arch Linux

```text
$ docker run -it --rm -v "$(pwd):/workspace" -w /workspace archlinux:latest
$ ./compute-crc32 MANIFEST.MF
CRC32: 6318fb
$ ./compute-crc32 MANIFEST.MF "$(cat splits)"
Using splits: 512,1024,1320,1832,2344,2856,3368,3880,4392,4904,5416,5766,6278,6790,7302,7814,8326,8838,9093,9605,10117,10629,11141,11653,12165,12677,13189,13559,14071,14583,15095,15607,16119,16631,17143,17655,18052,18564,19076,19588,20100,20612,21124,21636,21952,22464,22976,23488,24000,24512,25024,25536,26048,26560,27072,27584,27619,28131,28643,29155,29667,30179,30691,31203,31715,32227,32739,33251,33694,34206,34718,35230
CRC32: 49656e6
```

(CRC32 values differ.)
